Mounting ðŸ”Œ

Provides powerful and effective mounting âœ¨

Usage Example ðŸ”¨

mount Settings:
  "/":
    ...
mount Profile:
  mount "/settings" -> Settings
  mount "/config" -> Settings

serve(...):  # or appRoutes
  mount "/profile" -> Profile

macro mount(mountName, body: untyped): untyped
Registers new mount

Usage

mount User:
  get "/":
    "Hello, from user"

serve "127.0.0.1", 5000:
  mount "/user" -> User
